channel.title: Matrix 718 Torva vote requirment
channel.description:
Hello everyone,
I've recently just started my own server again and I haven't done this in ages, the last time I did it wasn't a 718 either. I'm using the matrix source and client and I've come across an annoying problem where when you try to equipt Torva or any weapons/armor like that it won't let me and says I need to vote to wear it for 24 hours. I've looked all over the web and scoured through so many lines of code to no avail. If someone could help guide me in deleting the feature so everyone can wear Torva on my server.
Thank you very much.

item.title: Matrix 718 Torva vote requirment
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

Have you tried searching for the Torva’s ID on your server files and checking to see what comes up?

Read full topic

item.description:
@Alkovary wrote:

I do have skype i’m currently at work though so I’ll have to wait to add you and get your help until it home. I believe my username is miulky though

Read full topic
